name: Halloween Night (Zegaren, famicon80)
description:
Quickly get as much candy as you can while avoiding the hazards of this special Halloween night. Dash between houses, cut through lawns and avoid your typical neighborhood dangers... and more? 

What's the best method of trick or treating? You decide! Hear a thumping noise? Munch on your candy for that sweet, sweet speed boost. Full basket of candy slowing you down? Dump it off at your Parent's car! The whole neighborhood is yours to get those sweet rewards.

When you're ready to go back home and count your spoils, just step on the floating red arrow near your parent's car. Before you know it, you'll have a dentist appointment booked for next week.

CONTROLS:

WASD = movement

LEFT CLICK = knock on doors / Dump candy at the car

RIGHT CLICK = Eat a candy for bonus movement speed

Created by Zegaren and Famicon80
